Rafizi jangka Malaysia bakal rugi RM140 juta projek tren Mekah]]KUALA LUMPUR: Ahli Parlimen Pandan (PKR), Rafizi Ramli hari ini mempersoalkan penglibatan Syarikat Prasarana Malaysia Berhad dalam projek kereta api di Mekah, Arab Saudi, selepas jawapan bertulis menteri kewangan yang menunjukkan syarikat pengangkutan awam itu kerugian hampir RM100 juta setakat ini.“Dalam keadaan Prasarana sudah alami kerugian saban tahun apabila kos operasinya melebihi kutipan tiket, kenapa ia dibebankan dengan projek kereta api metro di Arab Saudi ini,” soal naib presiden PKR itu dalam sidang media di bangunan Parlimen hari ini.Rafizi berkata beliau menjangkakan syarikat milik Kementerian Kewangan itu akan mengalami kerugian sebanyak RM142 juta secara keseluruhannya sejak permulaan projek itu pada 2015, sehingga Mei tahun depan.Prasarana diberi kontrak mengambil alih kerja mengendali dan menyelenggara tren haji Al Mashaaer Al Mugaddassah Makkah Metro Southern Line (MMMSL) daripada China Railway Construction Consortium (CRCC).Nilai keseluruhan kontrak tersebut sepanjang Disember 2014 hingga Mei 2018 adalah RM930 juta.Menjawab Rafizi di Dewan Rakyat, Najib berkata setakat 30 Jun tahun ini, Prasarana menerima RM580 juta daripada Arab Saudi, tetapi jumlah yang dibelanjakan setakat itu ialah RM679 juta, iaitu kurang RM99 juta.

just bcos they won didn't mean they already received the money.same like in rafizi's case, he lost the defamatory lawsuit and now they are asking him to pay or else they are gonna proceed with bankruptcy charge.iinm got 1 case where 6 ppl sued govt. due to wrongful ISA detention and each 'won'  RM1 million ++, to this day they have yet to be paid their court awarded money due to lengthy appeal process....

no he did not made up the kondo story.the point is the NFC bought the condo using govt. approved loans but didn't put the lembu inside the condo.rafizi exposed that funds meant for the project was 'parked' under those condo properties bcos they need to do something with the money and since the project was going very slow they spent it on those condo purchases, with the 'hope' that the condo will appreciate in value and later can be sold for a profit.which is still wrong anyway as the loan was supposed to go to the feedlot project and not to speculate on properties.you take a loan to expand business, suddenly you use the money to buy house, that is against the terms of the loan, and lender have right to terminate loan.to make the news sensational he claimed NFC bought condos for the lembu to live in.which NFC then used it against him in a defamatory suit (saman malu).claiming NFC didn't put the lembu to live in the condo as rafizi sensationally referred to it.
